Name: Pistol
Text: Standard issue

Name: Uzi
Text: Short range automatic weapon
precision shot: hit all on first filled row

Name: Shotgun
Text: Close quarters only

Name: Battle Rifle
Text: Versatile

Name: Sniper Rifle
precision shot: hit all enemies in line to target

Name: Rocket Launcher
precision shot: hit all surrounding enemies for 3 damage. if enemies affected are in cover they take no damage and lose cover for next turn

Name: Frag Grenade
Text: choose one enemy. deal 2 damage to that enemy and adjacent enemies. if they are in cover they take no damage but lose cover for next turn

Name: Flash Bang Grenade
Text: enemies in nearest row miss next turn

Name: Smoke Grenade
Text: choose a column. enemies in that column miss next turn

Name: Grenadier
Text: Deals damage to all players

Name: Shield Guy
Text: is considered in cover while has shield. shield has 1 health and must be destroyed first

Name: Cover
Text: can only be destroyed by rocket launcher or red barrel

Name: Red Barrel
Text: if destroyed by any weapon, deals 5 damage to surrounding enemies

Name: Shot
Text: choose one of your weapons and fire

Name: Precision Shot
Text: do precision shot of one of your weapons

Name: Enter Cover
Text: to be played at end of turn, negates any damage before next turn

Name: Tactical Movement
Text: negate enemy cover / reveal to dodge enemy grenade

Name: First Aid
Text: choose one other player to heal by 4 points of health

Name: Adrenaline Injection
Text: heal self by 2 points of health

Name: Hide
Text: allow shield to recharge

Name: Reload
Text: discard any number of cards and draw that number of cards

Name: Take Cover
Text: choose one other player and take their damage on next turn instead of them (damage is halved?)

Name: Coordination
Text: if another player can reveal this card they get a free shot now

Name: Stealth
Text: fire without alerting neighbouring enemies (explosives and loud weapons excluded)

Name: Mark Target
Text: choose an enemy, this enemy takes double damage on next players turn
